name: 1s Enhancer
description: If you roll more than 2 ones, get a blue gem

name: High Roller
description: If no 1s and no 2s are rolled, get a green gem

name: Collector
description: Get a purple gem if all numbers 1-6 are rolled

name: Sixes Reward
description: If you have the most 6s, also get a red gem

name: Five's Friend
description: If you roll exactly two 5s, get a blue gem

name: Thirds Time
description: If you roll 2 or 4 threes, get a red gem

name: Mini Straight
description: If you roll 3 consecutive numbers, get a green gem

name: Four Finder
description: If you roll 4 of any number, get a purple gem

name: Artifact
description: Trade 2 red gems for 1 blue gem

name: Get More Gems
description: If you roll 4 of any number, get a purple gem

name: Discount
description: When buying, discard any card to pay for a gem

name: Rerolls
description: All players +1 reroll this round (starting with u)

name: Rerolls
description: Discard to reroll once

name: Set dice
description: Discard to set 1 dice to the face of your choice

name: Attack
description: All other players have 1 less reroll this round

name: Attack
description: All other players use 1 less dice this round

name: Attack
description: All other players, should remove 1 dice this round after the rolls

name: Attack
description: All other players should pay 1 extra gem of their choice this round to buy a card

name: Attack
description: All players discard a gem of their choice

name: Shield
description: Discard this card to block an attack targeting you

name: Trade
description: Gems to Gems
